scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.ddb: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && node build/scripts/create-tables.js && node build/scripts/populate-tables.js
scripts.ddbr: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && node build/scripts/delete-tables.js && npm run ddb
scripts.sns: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && node build/scripts/create-topics.js
